title: How to Complete Puzzle 1 1 in Scribblenauts

steps.headline: Look at the given hint.
steps.description: "Give two of them what they would use in their hands". Write two objects for two people. It can be the same object if two people would both use it. For example, you can give a scalpel to the chef and doctor.

steps.headline: Give the chef an object.
steps.description:
Any kitchen utensil, such as a frying pan, spoon, or bowl
Any edible food, such as doughnut, bacon, or bread

steps.headline: Give the doctor an object.
steps.description:
Any body part that can be held, such as hair, finger, or bone
Pills
Thermometer

steps.headline: Drag the object to the proper person.
Get the starite to complete the level.

text:
Look at the given hint. "Give two of them what they would use in their hands". Write two objects for two people. It can be the same object if two people would both use it. For example, you can give a scalpel to the chef and doctor. Give the policeman an object. Doughnut
Nightstick
Gun
Badge
Handcuffs Give the chef an object. Any kitchen utensil, such as a frying pan, spoon, or bowl
Any edible food, such as doughnut, bacon, or bread Give the doctor an object. Any body part that can be held, such as hair, finger, or bone
Pills
Thermometer Give the fireman an object. Hose (water)
Axe
Fire extinguisher Drag the object to the proper person.  Get the starite to complete the level. [[Image:Complete_Puzzle_1 1_in_Scribblenauts_Step_6.png}}
